des: ELDER TALKS LONELINESS Elder Problem... Isolation... AUDIENCE Elder Facilities & Elders Families & Elders... PRODUCED by Elder Radio & Television Network... POWERED by Elder Happiness Association... THANK YOU Psychology Today... THANK YOU Partners for Radio TV & OnLine Content... THANK YOU Audience for Joining In The Wonderful World of Elder Happiness... THANK YOU Everyone for Creating More Elder Happiness & Less Elder Loneliness... SIGNON Welcome to Elder Talks. Loneliness. At any time you can ask for Help. What would you like to know?... SIGNOFF Thank You. Tune In Again & All The Best In Your Elder Happiness... DISCLAIMER "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number“...
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
